Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_stop_3D_sample

The function AIL_stop_3D_sample pauses a 3D sample.

void AIL_stop_3D_sample(
  H3DSAMPLE S
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle to be paused.

Discussion

This function changes the status of a 3D sample to SMP_STOP. Use AIL_resume_3D_sample to restart.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_sample_status, AIL_end_3D_sample, AIL_resume_3D_sample, AIL_start_3D_sample
Related Basic Types: H3DSAMPLE, MILES_DIGITAL_STATUS, void
